title: HDD-OSD + KERMIT for PS2 Hard Drive
description:
Launch HDD-OSD from ulaunchelf, drop the 
contents of the "_sysconf" folder into your 
"_sysconf" folder, and the contents of the 
"_system" folder into your "_system" folder.
Make sure your hdd is formated, you can use 

"WinHIIP_v1.7.6" to format your hdd before 
dropping the files inside via ulaunchelf.
Then Launch "HDD-OSD" by selecting the 
"hosdsys" file. in the "ods100" folder.

KERMIT, has been given a new save ICON, when 
you use it to make your games bootable (the 
traditional hdloader icon). You can make 
your games bootable with HDD-OSD, make sure 
you drop the contents into the root of your 
memory card before use.

Tutorial Included, Easy Setup and Install
(this is the application version, use this version
of KERMIT on any HDD-OSD or any PSBBN
